By: Rand Fishkin April 13, 2006 Ad Inspiration Portal Online Advertising The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. There's thousands of design portals on the web, but when you need advertising inspiration (or just want to enjoy the creative minds of the global, relatively un-PC) Ads of the World is a pretty good source. I particularly liked this ad for hairdryers and this mouse pad ad/concept is fairly interesting (if a tad off-color). I think that a lot of sites forgot to have an attention grabber on the home page or in the headlines and these ads are certainly a step in the right direction on that front. Copied! Back to Top
